value.string:
<office:document-content xmlns:draw='http://openoffice.org/2000/drawing' xmlns:office='http://openoffice.org/2000/office' xmlns:text='http://openoffice.org/2000/text' xmlns:number='http://openoffice.org/2000/datastyle' xmlns:chart='http://openoffice.org/2000/chart' xmlns:table='http://openoffice.org/2000/table' xmlns:dr3d='http://openoffice.org/2000/dr3d' xmlns:fo='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format' xmlns:style='http://openoffice.org/2000/style' xmlns:form='http://openoffice.org/2000/form' xmlns:script='http://openoffice.org/2000/script' xmlns:svg='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' xmlns:math='http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML' office:class='spreadsheet' xmlns:tal='http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal'
 xmlns:i18n='http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n'
 xmlns:metal='http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal'
 xmlns:meta='http://openoffice.org/2000/meta'
 xmlns:dc='http://purl.oclc.org/dc'
 tal:attributes='dummy python:request.RESPONSE.setHeader("Content-Type", "text/html;; charset=utf-8")'
 office:version='1.0'>
 <office:meta>
 <dc:title>List Print</dc:title>
 <dc:creator>Nexedi</dc:creator>
 <dc:subject>Print Example</dc:subject>
 </office:meta>
 <office:script/>
 <office:font-decls>
 <style:font-decl style:font-pitch='variable' fo:font-family="'Andale Sans UI'" style:name='Andale Sans UI'/>
 <style:font-decl style:font-pitch='variable' fo:font-family="Tahoma, KacstBook, Lucidasans, 'Lucida Sans', 'Arial Unicode MS'" style:name='Tahoma'/>
 <style:font-decl style:font-pitch='variable' fo:font-family='Albany' style:font-family-generic='swiss' style:name='Albany'/>
 </office:font-decls>
 
 <tal:block metal:define-macro="form_layout"
 tal:define="group_list python: form.get_groups(include_empty=1);
 	 field_errors python: request.get('field_errors',{});
 dummy python: request.set('here',here); 
 		 listbox python:form.get_fields_in_group(group_list[len(group_list)-1])[0];
 		 selection_name python:listbox.get_value('selection_name', REQUEST=request);
 selection python:here.portal_selections.getSelectionFor(selection_name, REQUEST=request);
 is_domain_tree_mode python:selection.domain_tree_mode;
 is_report_tree_mode python:selection.report_tree_mode;
 listbox_line_list python:listbox.get_value('default', render_format='list', REQUEST=request);
 		 global max_level python:here.ListBox_getLevel(listbox_line_list)">
 
 
 <tal:block tal:define="global column_width python:here.Listbox_getColumnWidth(listbox_line_list,frame_width=20.0)"/>
 
 <office:automatic-styles>
 
 <style:style style:family='table-column' style:name='TableColumnTitleView'>
 <style:properties style:column-width='4.17cm' fo:break-before='auto'/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:family='table-column' style:name='TableColumnContentsView'>
 <style:properties style:column-width='4.17cm' fo:break-before='auto'/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:family='table-row' style:name='TableRowView'>
 <style:properties style:use-optimal-row-height='false' style:row-height='0.45cm' fo:break-before='auto'/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:master-page-name='Default' style:family='table' style:name='TableView'>
 <style:properties table:display='true'/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:parent-style-name='Default' style:family='table-cell' style:name='TableCellTitleView'>
 <style:properties fo:font-weight='bold' fo:font-size='9pt' fo:color='#666666' fo:border='0.002cm solid #000000' fo:font-style='italic' fo:background-color='#cccccc'/>
 </style:style>
 <style:style style:parent-style-name='Default' style:family='table-cell' style:name='TableCellContentsView'>
 <style:properties style:text-align-source='fix' fo:margin-left='0cm' fo:vertical-align='middle' fo:border='0.002cm solid #000000' fo:text-align='start'/>
 </style:style>
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/listbox_style_sxc_macro/macros/listbox"/>
 </office:automatic-styles>
 
 <office:body>
 <table:table table:style-name='TableView' table:name='feuille' tal:attributes="table:name python: here.Localizer.erp5_ui.gettext(template.title).encode('utf8') ">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="group python: group_list[:3]">
 <tal:block tal:define="field_list python: form.get_fields_in_group(group)">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: field_list not in [None, []]">
 
 <tal:block tal:repeat="field field_list">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:field.meta_type != 'HiddenStringField'">
 <!-- <table:table-column table:style-name='TableColumnTitleView' table:default-cell-style-name='Default'/>
 <table:table-column table:style-name='TableColumnContentsView' table:default-cell-style-name='Default'/> -->
 <table:table-row table:style-name='TableRowView'>
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellTitleView'>
 <text:p tal:content="python: here.Localizer.erp5_ui.gettext(field.get_value('title')).encode('utf-8')">Id</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 <table:table-cell table:number-rows-spanned='1' tal:attributes="table:number-columns-spanned python:len(column_width)-1" table:style-name='TableCellContentsView' tal:define="value python: field.get_value('default')">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: same_type(value,[]) or same_type(value,())">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="item value">
 	 <text:p tal:content="python: str(item)" >Dd</text:p>
 	 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: (not (same_type(value,[]) or same_type(value,()) )) and (value != None)">
 	 <text:p tal:content="python: '%s ' % value" >Dd</text:p>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: value == None">
 <text:p tal:content="python: ' '" />
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-cell>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 <table:table-row>
 <table:table-cell>
 <text:p tal:content="python: ' '"/>
 </table:table-cell>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: len(group_list) > 3">
 <tal:block tal:define="field_list python: form.get_fields_in_group(group_list[3])">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: field_list not in [None, []]">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="field field_list">
 
 <!--<tal:block tal:condition="python: field.meta_type == 'MatrixBox'">
 <tal:block tal:define="matrixbox python:field;">
 <div metal:use-macro="here/matrixbox_pdf_macro/macros/matrixbox" />
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>-->
 
 
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: field.meta_type == 'ListBox'">
 
 <tal:block tal:define="listbox python:field" >
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/listbox_table_contents_sxc_macro/macros/listbox"/>
 </tal:block>
 
 
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 
 
 
 
 </table:table>
 
 
 
 </office:body>
 
 </tal:block>
 </office:document-content>
